      public boolean removeAccount(String clientId, String accountNumber)
      Removes an account from a client's account list.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client to remove the account from.
      accountNumber - The account number of the account to remove.
      Returns:
      true if the account was removed, false otherwise.

      Finds an account by its account number.
      Parameters:
      accountNumber - The account number to search for.
      Returns:
